review: This place is great for dental care. Dr. Dharit is a skilled dentist. The procedure was seamless and fast.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have no words to thank Dr. Gandhi's Family for their i****** **** ********** experience and expertise in their field. I consider myself fortunate to be treated by soothing and comforting Dr. Dipti, Dr Mitali and Dr Sonali who has got shafa - the divine magic of healing gifted by almighty God. With their caring professional approach. I have 1000% trust and confidence from the day I started mine treatment till today and in future. Apart from being caring, they explained everything in detail, went through all my concerns. Last but not least deep deep thanks goes without saying to their assistant team for providing comfort and helpful approach to the clients.

Keep the good work going White Arc Dental team  and let the world smile and be happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******** I dread going to the dentist but he made sure the whole treatment was pain free and comfortable for me. The process became longer than usual as I am difficult patient. But Dr. Dharit Gandhi was super patient with me. Definitely recommend him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ******** ***** *** ****** ********* *** ** *** **** ****** ******* ** ******* with international standards and state of the art facilities.

 I am very happy and satisfied with their expertise and efficient treatment for all my dental conditions for over 20 years from the Gandhi family team of doctors at White Arc. 

I have been having treatment from Dr Dipti and Dr Dharit regularly and the support they have given me is immense and always prompt. 

What is noteworthy is that all the doctors team there, they provide very caring and compassionate treatment and they are thorough in addressing all the concerns of the patients. 

I have all the genuine praise for the entire team of family doctors at White Arc, as for me it’s been a great journey with them for all my dental conditions. 

Their sympathetic attitude towards patients is remarkable. They make you feel very comfortable every time you approach them. 

They take the time in explaining at length the condition so meticulously and with much patience, resolving all the patient’s queries.  

I would highly recommend Dr Gandhi’s White Arc Dental Studio.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,re-root canal,Chipped Tooth,Dental Fillings,
review: White Arc Dental Studio is exceptional..The warm and friendly staff instantly put me at ease upon arrival. The clinic's calming ambiance and attention to cleanliness further enhanced my comfort. Dr. Dharit Gandhi's professionalism and expertise were evident throughout my treatment, including a pain-free wisdom teeth extraction. His genuine commitment to patient care, evident in his thorough explanations and post-surgery availability, sets him apart. ****** ***** ** *********** ********* ********** **** *********** *********** The emphasis on compassionate care and empathy fosters trust and rapport. I now travel from Pune to Mumbai for all my dental needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have a jaw - locking problem, despite my mouth not opening up completely, Dharit patiently completed my dental fillings properly and without any discomfort.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Sincere gratitude for the outstanding dental implant procedure. The result is not only seamless in function but aesthetically superior to my natural tooth. Your expertise and dedication shine through, and I couldn't be happier with the outcome.

Thanks
Narinder Singh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely happy with the service and experience with Dr. Dharit and team. Thank you so much! Absolutely recommend everyone here to go to them for all your dental requirements.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had consulted numerous implant surgeons but every time it said that my jaw bone was quite thin to support the fixed implants for longer duration.
After consulting Dr. Dharit Gandhi, I had my bone graft and sinus lift surgery that helped me get me fixed implants.
Dr. Gandhi has a thorough and methodical approach. Has patience while explaining the procedure. His ability to work long hours during both the surgeries was commendable.
The assistants showed good teamwork skills.
The entire process was completed with comfort and hygiene.
Above all the entire treatment was worth the money I invested in it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Dharit was friendly and explained the issue properly and also cleared my doubts. They explained the dental cleaning procedure and also gave me options. They gave me a chance to reconsider things before going for a procedure or get a second opinion. They made the procedure as comfortable as possible by playing Friends for me on their big TV. Later, doctor also briefed me about how to maintain good teeth and mouth health. The clinic was was clean, nice, and hygenic. Couldn't have asked for anything more.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had scheduled my appointment with Dr. Gandhi's White Arc Dental Studio for my broken tooth. Being a dentist fearing patient, I was quite nervous of the whole situation. But i must say I was really impressed with my experience at Dr. Gandhi's White Arc Dental Studio. Dr. Dharit Gandhi's professional approach was not only limited to briefing on my tooth's condition but also explaining in detail on how and why the surgery will be done. My surgery was done by Dr. Sonali Gandhi which again was so smoothly and perfectly done that my tooth looked the same as before. It was amazing work. Every dental tools used were sterilised and all the techniques seemed very modern. With such experience I felt I was in safe  friendly hands. I highly recommend Dr. Gandhi's White Arc Dental Studio for all the dental problems and solutions.
reply_text:
Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience at White Arc Dental Studio. We are delighted to hear that despite your initial nervousness, you felt comfortable and well-cared for during your visit.

Dr. Dharit Gandhi’s thorough and professional approach, along with Dr. Sonali Gandhi’s skillful execution, clearly made a significant impact, and we’re thrilled that your tooth looks as good as new. Your appreciation of our sterilization practices and modern techniques is highly valued.

Your recommendation means a lot to us. We're committed to providing safe, friendly, and top-notch dental care, and it’s gratifying to know that you felt in good hands with us.

Best regards,
The White Arc Dental Studio Team
